i-- { for len(stack) > 1 && arr[stack[len(stack)-1]] > arr[i] { stack = stack[:len(stack)-1] } right[i] = stack[len(stack)-1] stack = append(stack, i) } ans := 0 for i, x := range arr { ans = (ans + x * (i - left[i]) * (right[i]-i)) % mod } return ans } äºŒæ¬¡éå†å˜å½¢ func sumSubarrayMins(arr []int) (ans int) { n := len(arr) left := make([]int, n) right := make([]int, n) for i := range right { right[i] = n } st := []int{-1} // -1 ä¸ºå“¨å…µï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿è®¡ç®—èµ‹å€¼ for i, x := range arr { for len(st) > 1 && arr[st[len(st)-1]] >= x { right[st[len(st)-1]] = i // i æ°å¥½æ˜¯æ ˆé¡¶çš„å³è¾¹ç•Œ st = st[:len(st)-1] } left[i] = st[len(st)-1] // å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è®¡ç®— i - st[len(st)-1] st = append(st, i) } for i, x := range arr { ans += x * (i - left[i]) * (right[i] - i) // ç´¯åŠ è´¡çŒ® } return ans % (1e9 + 7) } ä¼˜åŒ–ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼šä¸€æ¬¡éå† func sumSubarrayMins(arr []int) (ans int) { arr = append(arr, -1) st := []int{-1} // å“¨å…µ for r, x := range arr { for len(st) > 1 && arr[st[len(st)-1]] >= x { i := st[len(st)-1] st = st[:len(st)-1] ans += arr[i] * (i - st[len(st)-1]) * (r - i) // ç´¯åŠ è´¡çŒ® } st = append(st, r) } return ans % (1e9 + 7) } å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)ã€‚ ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)ã€‚ æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼šåŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ const mod int = 1e9 + 7 func sumSubarrayMins(arr []int) (ans int) { n := len(arr) dp := make([]int, n) stack := []int{} // æ ˆä¸­ä¿æŒæ•°ç»„ç´¢å¼• for i, x := range arr { // ç§»é™¤æ ˆé¡¶æ¯”å½“å‰æ•°å¤§çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ•° for len(stack) > 0 && arr[stack[len(stack)-1]] > x { stack = stack[:len(stack)-1] } k := i + 1 // æ ˆä¸ºç©ºçš„kå€¼ if len(stack) > 0 { k = i - stack[len(stack)-1] } dp[i] = k * x if len(stack) > 0 { dp[i] += dp[i-k] } ans = (ans+dp[i]) % mod stack = append(stack, i) } return ans } å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)ã€‚ ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(n)ã€‚ LeetCodeé¢˜åº“åœ°å€ https://leetcode.
